item.title: Enterprise Software Admin Guide
item.description: Tools used: Ixiasoft CCMS, Snagit, Microsoft PowerPoint A technical writing project for a human resource solution involved creating a new administrator guide consisting of over 30 topics. In addition to updating the documentation with the new features and changes for the following release, I also created a relationship diagram and an implementation flow chart with clickable hotpot, to help users to understand the solution’s workflow and navigate through the system more efficiently.
